title: Drawing, "Designs for Souvenir Fans for the 1867 Paris Exposition Universelle", 1866–67
medium: Transparent and opaque watercolor, white gouache, graphite indicating fan shape on white wove paper
inscribed:
Upper left, graphite: No 2
Lower left, graphite: No 29
Upper right, graphite: 265
description:
Fan design consisting of 3 images
At left: classical bust, right profile of a bearded man, terra cotta ground, rose and leaf border, oval shape
Center: dancing Bacchante & Satyr on black ground, twig and leaf border; inscribed on blue ribbon, pen and red ink: Exposition Universel, Produit de L’exposition, à Paris, Année 1867
At right: classical bust, left profile of a woman, terra cotta ground, rose and leaf border, oval shape

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, "Designs for Souvenir Fans for the 1867 Paris Exposition Universelle", 1866–67.Transparent and opaque watercolor, white gouache, graphite indicating fan shape on white wove paper. Gift of M. Roy Fisher. 1976-105-2.
